name: Grinning Face
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a broad, open smile.

name: Heart Eyes
description: A yellow face with an open smile and hearts for eyes, expressing love or adoration.

name: Thinking Face
description: A yellow face with a single raised eyebrow and hand on chin, in deep thought.

name: Laughing Tears
description: A yellow face with a big grin and tears streaming down, laughing so hard it hurts.

name: Sunglasses Face
description: A yellow face wearing black sunglasses, conveying coolness or confidence.

name: Red Heart
description: A classic red heart symbol representing love, affection, and emotion.

name: Fire
description: A flame emoji representing fire, heat, or something exciting and trending.

name: Star
description: A classic five-pointed star, often used for ratings or highlighting something special.

name: Thumbs Up
description: A thumbs-up gesture indicating approval, agreement, or encouragement.

name: Clapping Hands
description: Two hands clapping together, showing applause or appreciation.

name: Waving Hand
description: A hand waving, used for greeting or saying goodbye.

name: Rocket
description: A rocket ship blasting off, symbolizing speed, progress, or space exploration.

name: Laptop
description: A laptop computer, representing technology, work, or digital activities.

name: Light Bulb
description: An illuminated light bulb, symbolizing ideas, inspiration, or innovation.

name: Book
description: A stack of books representing reading, education, or knowledge.

name: Pizza
description: A slice of pepperoni pizza, a popular comfort food worldwide.

name: Coffee
description: A steaming cup of coffee, representing energy, breaks, or morning routines.

name: Apple
description: A red apple, symbolizing health, education, or fresh produce.

name: Sun
description: A bright sun with rays, representing sunny weather or happiness.

name: Rainbow
description: A colorful rainbow arc, symbolizing hope, diversity, or good weather after rain.

name: Tree
description: A deciduous tree with green leaves, representing nature and the environment.

name: Dog Face
description: A friendly dog face, representing man's best friend and loyalty.

name: Cat Face
description: A cute cat face with whiskers, symbolizing cats and feline companions.

name: Butterfly
description: A colorful butterfly, representing transformation and natural beauty.

name: Musical Note
description: Musical notes representing music, singing, or entertainment.

name: Video Game
description: A video game controller, representing gaming and digital entertainment.

name: Soccer Ball
description: A black and white soccer ball, representing the world's most popular sport.

name: Party Popper
description: A party popper with confetti, celebrating special occasions and achievements.

name: Check Mark
description: A green check mark indicating completion, approval, or verification.

name: Warning Sign
description: A yellow warning triangle, alerting to caution or potential danger.
